inputs.schema_description: A JSON object with a 'topics' property: array of strings (key topics extracted from the content for Instagram post generation).

A JSON object with an 'ig_posts' property: array of objects, each with 'text' (string, the post content in 100-300 characters, engaging and Instagram-appropriate) and 'hashtags' (array of strings, 3-10 relevant hashtags for the post).

source_content.description: Source content to generate posts from

reference_image_path.description: Path to reference image file for style analysis (local file path)

reference_image_url.description: URL to reference image for style analysis (will be downloaded to temp file)

image_query.description: Search query for Unsplash image search (optional)

enable_image_search.description: Enable automatic image search based on topics

style_analysis.description: Visual style analysis results (if reference image provided)

recommendations.description: IG Post design recommendations (if reference image provided)

photos.description: Unsplash search results (if image search enabled)

output_artifacts.summary_template: 基於「{{input.source_content}}」生成的 {{input.post_count}} 篇 Instagram 貼文
